name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the scene or its i18n key.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: The slug name of the scene or its i18n key.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the scene or its i18n key.
description.example: This is a super scene with awesome things in it

background.title: Background
background.description: The background color of the scene.

fx.title: FX
fx.description: The UID of the special effect (FX) set to apply to the scene.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: The list of tags associated to the scene.

thumbnails.title: Thumbnails
thumbnails.description: The configuration of a thumbnail associated to a scene. Each member is an instance of a scene thumbnail.

hotspots.title: Hotspots
hotspots.description: The list of hotspots associated to this scene. Each member is and instance of a hotspot.
